options.name: Skirmisher
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Evade. You don't provoke opportunity attacks when you dash.

options.name: Mobile Combatant
options.description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn.

options.name: Hit and Run
options.description: After you make a melee attack against a creature, you can move up to half your movement speed as a free action.

options.name: Lightning Reflexes
options.description: Gain +1 Evade and +1 Initiative. You can use the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

options.name: Action : Flying Strike
options.description: Move up to your speed and make a weapon attack. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

options.name: Reaction : Sidestep
options.description: When a creature targets you with an attack, you can move 5 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. If this causes the attack to miss, you can move an additional 5 feet.

options.name: Harrying Attacks
options.description: Your attacks reduce the target's movement speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. Gain +1 Evade.

options.name: Action : Disorienting Strike
options.description: Make a weapon attack that deals normal damage. If it hits, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against all creatures except you until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Free Action : Battle Flow
options.description: After defeating an enemy, you can move up to half your movement speed and make an additional attack against a different target as a free action.

options.name: Master Skirmisher
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Evade. You can take the Dash action as a bonus action. When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't slow your movement that turn.
